Name: lysa arryn
Sentence: You bring him here without permission? You pollute my home with his presence? Your aunt has done a bad thing, Robin, a very bad thing. You remember her, don't you? Isn't he beautiful? And strong too. Jon knew it. His last words were, "the seed is strong." He wanted everyone to know what a good, strong boy his son would grow up to be. Look at him, the Lord of all the Vale.

Name: lysa arryn
Sentence: To stay away from them! Not to bring one here!

Name: lysa arryn
Sentence: It is.

Name: lysa arryn
Sentence: He's Tyrion the Imp of House Lannister. He killed your father. He murdered the Hand of the King!

Name: lysa arryn
Sentence: You will watch your tongue! These men are Knights of the Vale. Every one of the loved Jon Arryn. Every one of them would die for me.

Name: lysa arryn
Sentence: Shh... Shh... Shh, my sweet boy. He's just trying to frighten us. Lannisters are all liars. No one will hurt my baby.

Name: lysa arryn
Sentence: Perhaps you will, my little love.

Name: lysa arryn
Sentence: Ser Vardis, my sister's guest is weary. Take him down below so he can rest. Introduce him to Mord.

Name: lysa arryn
Sentence: You wish to confess your crimes?

Name: lysa arryn
Sentence: Skycells always break them. Speak, Imp. Meet your gods as an honest man.

Name: lysa arryn
Sentence: Silence!

Name: lysa arryn
Sentence: What do you think you're doing?

Name: lysa arryn
Sentence: You've had your little joke. I trust you enjoyed it. Mord, take him back to the dungeon. But this time find a smaller cell, with a steeper floor.

Name: lysa arryn
Sentence: If you're tried and found guilty, then by the king's own laws you will pay with your life.

Name: lysa arryn
Sentence: We have no executioner in the Eyrie. Life is more elegant here. Open the Moon Door.

Name: lysa arryn
Sentence: You want a trial, my Lord Lannister. Very well. My son will listen to whatever you have to say, and you will hear his judgement. Then you will leave, by one door or the other.

Name: lysa arryn
Sentence: You have that right.

Name: lysa arryn
Sentence: Ser Vardisâ€¦ You're quiet. Did you want to avenge my husband?

Name: lysa arryn
Sentence: You demanded a trial by combat.

Name: lysa arryn
Sentence: The Kingslayer is hundreds of miles from here.

Name: lysa arryn
Sentence: The trial will be today.

Name: lysa arryn
Sentence: I think that we can assume that no one is willing -

Name: lysa arryn
Sentence: You don't fight with honor!

Name: lysa arryn
Sentence: Hush now, darling. You just ate.

Name: lysa arryn
Sentence: Soon, love, soon.

Name: lysa arryn
Sentence: Go on, sweet. Time for your bath. I'll feed you after.

Name: lysa arryn
Sentence: Of course I fear for the safety of my son!

Name: lysa arryn
Sentence: The knights of the Vale will stay in the Vale where they belong, to protect their Lord.
